_comment: Benchmark of all locally installed Ollama models via local_server provider. Run 'ollama list' to confirm models are available before running. Set TALKBOT_LOCAL_SERVER_URL in .env to point at your Ollama instance (e.g. http://mudmachine:11434/v1). Known issues: gemma3 ignores tool API and invents slash commands; phi4-mini and mistral-nemo leak raw tool tokens into responses; deepseek-r1:1.5b produces empty tool responses (reasoning model, no tool support at this size).
